en.bootable_status: This volume "{0}" is bootable volume, Do you want to set volume to unbootable ?
en.cancel_transfer_text: Do you want to cancel the transfer of {0} ?
en.create_transfer_tip: Please remember authorization key in case of accepting transfer.
en.no_avail_type: No available type to create volume
en.no_bootable_status: This volume "{0}" is unbootable volume, Do you want to set volume to bootable ?
en.tip_volume_snapshot: Create snapshot for volumes. The performance volume can only create performance snap. So is capacity volume.
en.tip_volume_create_error: No quota left to create volume

zh-CN.bootable_status: 云硬盘"{0}"是可引导盘，确定要修改为不可引导盘吗？
zh-CN.cancel_transfer_text: 确定取消转让云硬盘{0}吗?
zh-CN.create_transfer_tip: 为了接受转让硬盘，请记住当前 authorization key.
zh-CN.no_avail_type: 没有可用的云硬盘类型, 无法创建云硬盘
zh-CN.no_bootable_status: 云硬盘"{0}"是不可引导盘，确定要修改为可引导盘吗？
zh-CN.no_volume_type: 没有可用的云硬盘类型
zh-CN.read_write_all: 将云硬盘"{0}"设置为可读写吗？
zh-CN.set_read_only: 将云硬盘"{0}"设置为只读吗？
zh-CN.tip_volume_snapshot: 为云硬盘创建快照。性能型云硬盘只能创建性能型云硬盘快照，容量型云硬盘只能创建容量型快照。
zh-CN.tip_volume_create_error: 配额不足，无法创建云硬盘
